name: GI-DROID
description:
CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS - MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT

Z - USE JUMP THRUSTERS [ WHITE BAR ]

X - FIRE LASERS [ RED BAR ]

C - FIRE MISSILES [ ORANGE BAR ]

UP + X - FIRE LASERS UP

DOWN + X - FIRE LASERS DOWN

S + SPACE - SKIP LEVEL

Play as a small general infantry droid in enemy territory !

Face off agianst tough challenges, as you try to escape !

Made by GPXF for mini Ludum Dare 56.

This game support scontrollers, I have tested the Xbox360 controller and the DualShock4.
